snippet.title: The Batman (2022) 4K - Batman Escapes the Cops | Movieclips
snippet.description:
The Batman - Batman Escapes the Cops: Batman (Robert Pattinson) escapes the police station.
BUY THE MOVIE: https://athome.fandango.com/content/browse/details/The-Batman/2008348?cmp=Movieclips_YT_Description 
More Ways to Watch: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/the_batman#where-to-watch?cmp=Movieclips_YT_Description
 
Watch the best The Batman scenes & clips: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZbXA4lyCtqqyrENYez56gXvvngZzR_Bz

Subscribe and click the bell to be notified of all your favorite movie scenes: http://bit.ly/2CZa490 

► Download the Rotten Tomatoes app: https://bit.ly/4lcQqHs
 
FILM DESCRIPTION: 
Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the evidence begins to lead closer to home and the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must forge new relationships, unmask the culprit and bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that has long plagued the metropolis. 
 
CREDITS:
TM & © Warner Bros. Pictures (2022)
Cast: Gil Perez-Abraham, Jeffrey Wright, Robert Pattinson
Director: Matt Reeves
Producer: Matt Reeves
Screenwriter: Matt Reeves, Peter Craig
